description: A PHP script for updating menu items and inserting data into a cart, including form handling, database queries, and embedded HTML/CSS for UI.

methods.name: mysqli_connect
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the MySQL database.

methods.name: mysqli_query
methods.description: Performs a query against the database.

methods.name: mysqli_fetch_array
methods.description: Fetches a result row as an associative array.

methods.name: file_get_contents
methods.description: Reads a file into a string.

methods.name: addslashes
methods.description: Escapes special characters in a string for use in an SQL statement.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Sends a raw HTTP header to redirect the user.
